QueryToExecute:
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when enhanced_vpc_routing then 'ok'
    else 'alarm'
  end as status,
  case
    when enhanced_vpc_routing then title || ' enhanced VPC routing enabled.'
    else title || ' enhanced VPC routing disabled.'
  end as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_redshift_cluster;
